channel.title: Need Help
channel.description:
Hello,
i am posting this thread because i need help with fixing my problem. my problem is that whenever i try and go onto any client an error says
'JAVA' is not reconized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Pres any key to continue...
this error occured after i tried to put a moparscape server online and i changed my PATH and some other things like that.. and i cannot remember what was there before i changed it.
please help me for moparscapes sake.
